body.name: Lightweight Travel Stroller - Compact Umbrella Stroller for Airplane, One-Hand Folding Baby Stroller, Newborn Infant Stroller w/Adjustable Backrest/Footrest/Canopy/T-Shaped Bumper (Black)
features: 【Ultra small and Light】 Folds super small: 16.5" x 8.7" x 22", and ultra-lightweight stroller only 14 lbs. Ultra compact and portable design, perfect for shopping/travel by airplane. This travel stroller fit all different airlines overhead bins

【Convenient & One-Hand Fold/Unfold】 The Modern T-shaped Bumper is designed for you Drag the travel stroller, rotated T bumper to pulling bar when folded, making the travel road more comfortable and labor-saving. The lightweight stroller Simple one-hand fold/unfold in 3 seconds and went through airport security easily, and the automatic lock hook allows the mother without bending down, making the trip more convenient

【Ues From Newborn】This compact stroller can lie flat, suitable for babies aged 0-3 years. Spacious cockpit up to 15'', adjustable footrest and anti-skid pedals make the baby more comfortable. T Bumper for better recreational journey, the infant stroller with swivel front wheels makes it easy for the mother to push. Durable spring suspension for smoothly moving, and baby can sleep quickly

【Luxury Umbrella Stroller】The baby stroller w/Extra-large 4-position adjustable canopy to help cope with sunny, rainy, cloudy and other weather during the travel. The peek-a-boo window make the mother can see the baby when pushing the lightweight stroller. The compact travel stroller is equipped with a storage basket, beauty and convenience, and saves mommy's bag

【Safety】The lightweight baby stroller has passed ASTM and CPSC certification, you can choose with confidence. The 5-point harness system effectively protects the baby's safety, safety wrist strap to prevent it from slipping off. The One touch brake firmly protect the safety of the baby. As the manufacturer, COOL KIDS stands behind all our products with great customer service and support. If there is anything we can do to help you, please let us know

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made traveling with a stroller a breeze
reviews.reviewText: Definitely worth the purchase! Stroller is super light, easy to open and close with only one hand and comfortable enough that my toddler could nap on-the-go in the stroller while we were out and about on our trip. The handle bar in the seat was fun for my toddler to hold onto and we used it to put her feet up when they were napping so their feet weren’t dangling off the edge of the seat in that uncomfortable way. We got rained on three days in a row and every night, the stroller air dried so quickly and without any problems.I do wish the basket at the bottom was a little bigger but that’s just a personal preference. I became an expert at fitting as many things as I possibly could fit into that basket compartment and it did tear a liiiittle in one of the corners but it still stood strong and held everything well.Also, we’re used to bigger wheels on our regular stroller so it took some getting used to with these smaller wheels but a few hours into our first day with the stroller and I was very used to the stroller’s way of getting around. It’s very smooth and definitely was worth the extra cost to buy a travel stroller that was easy on-the-go. This definitely fulfilled that and now we have a great product that we’ll be able to use for future trips.We actually saw a couple of families with this same stroller when we went on our trip and they looked to be enjoying the product as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic travel stroller
reviews.reviewText: Travelled with a 3 month old from the US to the Netherlands, Belgium, and the UK. Multiple stops in each location, and traveled by plane, train, ferry, and rental car. This stroller suited all our needs and handles everything extremely well. It fit between the seats in planes, and folds up enough to be stowed in the overhead compartment. Lightweight, easy to manuever, as well as fold open and close at a moments notice. My wife and I are super happy we went with this stroller.There are a couple of improvements that could be made. There is no padding, so it would be uncomfortable for a baby without a blanket to lay on, a foam pad down in would easily solve this problem. Additionally, the extender handle wasn't made well and fully pulled out and was difficult to reinstert.My wife and I are also shorter people, but our tall friends 6'+ had a hard time towing the stroller when it was collapsed. We had no issues like that.Still, for extensive travel, this stroller was a champ!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not suited for taller individuals
reviews.reviewText: The stroller is alright. It’s lightweight, easy to use and very convenient to carry around. However, if you’re taller then 5’8 I wouldn’t recommend. The handles don’t rise so when walking it kinda puts you at an odd angle. I live in Germany and the stroller on cobblestone isn’t so easy. But on pavement it’s so smooth. The strollers materials and straps are kind of flimsy. They’re good for traveling but maybe not everyday use. The straps feel cheaper then a dollar store book bag and if you have an alligator rolling child fastening them in will be frustrating due to all the small pieces that have to connect. But if you’re looking for a good quick stroller, it’ll work great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for a recent trip & I LOVE it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this stroller specifically for a trip to Europe that I took with my family. I wanted a stroller that was lightweight, easy to maneuver, and could withstand the cobblestone streets. This stroller checked all of those boxes! It was so easy to fold & my almost 2-year-old daughter was so comfortable! It is made of sturdy material that I'm sure will last. I can't recommend it enough

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE this stroller. It’s so small, so light, and we can strap our carseat to it using our big orange travel belt, making airport travel much easier. I originally got it just for travel but it’s now our main stroller since it’s so small, and our baby likes to hold onto the handle.I will say I’m afraid it will break if we gate check it, so I always put it overhead on planes. The gate agents have tried to argue with me about it but I don’t bring any other carry-ons, just this little guy, and they let me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pricey but works!
reviews.reviewText: We got this to bring on our cruise with our 11m old. It folds VERY small, we brought on the plane as a carry on and fit up in the overhead bin no problem. My baby loves hanging on the handle bars and pushing the stroller with them too when we were waiting in the airport. The lightweight and narrowness of this is so great!A few cons, it does feel very cheap and lightweight compared to our main stroller. It doesn’t recline all the way, and the cover does not cover really at all. It might cover a bigger kid but not our baby. The stroller wheels are definitely worn just after 1 week of use.I think any other umbrella stroller feels the same, I guess the price is just for the compact ability of this. I don’t think that’s worth the price though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Stroller for travel!
reviews.reviewText: My son is 7 and tall and this stroller still worked out great for him. He’s in a wheelchair and when I needed to fly for a work trip I was reluctant to travel with his wheelchair. Airlines are famous for not taking very good care of wheelchairs and seeing that this folded up to the size of a carry-on and the handle folds out for easy wheeling I had to try it. It worked out perfect! I was able to wheel him right onto the plane and the stroller easily folded up and fit in the overhead bin! It’s lightweight and easy to steer with one hand. The only downside is there’s no parent storage pouch so you can’t just throw your wallet or cellphone in the little storage part by the handle. But otherwise it has been perfect

Bought the stroller for travel. Pretty good compact stroller. Easy to fold and unfold. I found the seller to be quite helpful in answering the concerns in a timely manner and also solving my issue quite fast.

This was the second stroller we purchased for a gift for my daughter, the 1st one was too heavy and large to fit in airplane over head. This stroller is light and quite easy to open and close. At the same time it is very well built and sturdy. She is very happy with this stroller..
